Name: Mineirinho Wildtides DC
About the game: In this new adventure, Miner and his friends will have to be the greatest of the seven seas to face creatures and lovecraftian places !!! A 2d platform shooter game with small rogue-like elements and physically real water !!! Physically real water. Coop mode super fun. Influences of HP Lovecraft Creations. Small rogue-like power ups. Intense Action.
